DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_Leave_03_03: Boys, let's get this party started!
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_Leave_03_02: Well, there may be a problem with you leaving peacefully. I can't risk you going to your friends, so...
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadIdea_15_01: This escapade was not a good idea...
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadIdea_03_02: What are you talking about? I'm very happy! My colleagues are too, look how they are smiling!
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadIdea_15_03: Do you realize you're going to regret this bitterly?
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadIdea_03_04: I don't think so. See, I can't have you running for reinforcements, so...
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadLuck_15_01: You mess with the wrong guy.
DIA_Leader_QM302_Trouble_BadLuck_03_02: Look! He can bite back! With that attitude, young man, you'll either go very far or die very quickly. If I had to bet, I'd bet on the latter.
